content: There are so-called primitive cultures in the jungles of the Amazon and on the island of New Guinea, and there are so-called advanced cultures in Europe, Asia, and Africa, but the languages of these cultures are all equally advanced and complex.
translations: ita:Ci sono culture cosiddette primitive nella giungla del Rio delle Amazzoni e sull'isola della Nuova Guinea, e ci sono cul
